sentences.en: He felt an onrush of shame.
sentences.cn: 他感到一阵羞耻袭上心头.

sentences.en: He was knocked down by the onrush of water.
She was screwing up her eyes against the onrush of air.
sentences.cn: 一阵风突然吹来，她眯起了眼睛。

sentences.en: The high winds that accompany the onrush of water also have scouring effect on the land.
sentences.cn: 大风伴随汹涌的水流,也会对土地造成冲刷效应.

sentences.en: The onrush of tears took me by surprise.
sentences.cn: 我没料到自己竟一下子泪如泉涌。

trans.tran_en: a strong fast movement forward, or the sudden development of something
